mapper.select: select count(invite_code) from t_store where is_deleted = 0 and invite_code = #{inviteCode}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (user_code, user_name, user_acct, user_password, user_sex, user_phone, user_mail, user_idcard, user_role, is_deleted, create_user, create_time, update_time, last_modified_by, version) values (#{userCode}, #{userName}, #{userAcct}, #{userPassword}, #{userSex}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userIdCard}, #{userRole}, #{isDeleted}, #{createBy}, now(), now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)

insert into t_sys_cust (cust_code, invite_code, is_deleted, create_user, create_time, update_time, last_modified_by, version) values (#{userCode}, #{inviteCode}, #{isDeleted}, #{createBy}, now(), now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)
mapper.select: select a.viewpage_code viewPageCode, a.viewpage_path viewPagePath, a.viewpage_num viewPageNum, a.goods_code goodsCode from t_viewpage a where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.viewpage_state = 1 order by a.viewpage_num asc

select a.hot_sort hotSort, a.goods_code goodsCode, b.goods_name goodsName, b.now_price nowPrice, b.cost_price costPrice, from t_hot_goods a, t_goods b where a.is_deleted = 0 and b.is_deleted = 0 and a.goods_code = b.goods_code order by a.hot_sort asc
